title: Drax Group Plc - Power Plants and SWOT Analysis Market Growing to Boost Industry Forecast by 2015
content: at 12:20 PM EDT Albany, NY -- (SBWIRE) -- 09/03/2015 -- The report contains a detailed description of the power generation company's business operations, history, corporate strategy, and business structure.
